attributes.action: Be unjustly removing people from benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Incapacity tests make no allowances for heart problems. this was even said by tribunal panel who upheld decision to stop benefit to a 63 year man with heart failure

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
